text: Meredith and I met in fourth grade at
the westside elementary school when we
were all of 10 years old Jason and I
rode the bus to school together and he
would talk to me on the bus every day
pepper me with questions and in the next
day I would get the same exact questions
over and over again we became fast
friends as soon as she came to our
school we played basketball together we
talked about movies together we would
even eat breakfast together I would
bring different varieties of cereal onto
the bus and plastic baggies and we would
share and talk about whatever was going
on
we first gave romance a shy in eighth
grade we went to the movies for the
first time and we held hands and I was
extremely nervous but that relationship
didn't work out for for a lot of reasons
primarily due to the difference in our
heights I was a 57 basically close to
the same height i am now and he was just
a little bit over 5 feet at the time
after the eighth grade experiment there
was a point when we went to camp
together we were out on a friend's boat
and I I looked at her and it was the
same best friend that I had always had
since fourth grade but she was beautiful
and that was the real romance
during high school when we were dating
we would talk about you know what the
future would hold with going to college
and we decided that if we broke up in
college we should probably still get
married anyway and that we did want to
do that we would meet at the whaling
museum in Cold Spring Harbor to
reconvene and then go from there and get
married during that kind of high school
puppy love romance phase I quickly
realized that this is my best friend and
this is the girl that I want to spend
the rest of my life with and this is the
girl that I want to marry and regardless
of what happens in the future or where
we end up I'm gonna work at the at
making her my wife one guy we did
actually stay together during college so
we didn't really need the whaling museum
plan or did we because about a year ago
I had convinced Meredith there was a
wine tasting going on in cold spring
harbor right near where the whaling
museum was so he takes me into Cold
Spring Harbor we're walking around and
there's no wine bar she's already cold
already kind of complaining a little bit
a little frustrated she doesn't know
where this where this wine bar we're
going to is and eventually we end up in
front of the whaling museum and at this
point she's she's a little angry so I
start walking away from him and I start
going back towards where the rest of the
strip is and I turned back around to
look to see if he's following me and
he's already down on one knee and I
didn't know what he was doing at all so
I was very confused and then I realized
in his hands he had on the little
jewelry box there were a lot of kisses
and hugs and she was crying because you
know this was a very long time coming
this is the same girl that I knew when I
was 10 years old and it was just very
special
